Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: slender black wand

This wand appears to be made from some sort of black wood. Though slender, it is quite heavy. It is covered with glowing runes. There is one large rune that is flashing and one large rune that is pulsing. **WARNING** "whisper my wand" for instructions. Do NOT try to use it without knowing what you are doing!

A slender black wand with glowing runes on it. There is one large rune that is flashing, and one large rune that is pulsing. **WARNING** "whisper my wand" for instructions. Do NOT try to use it without knowing what you are doing!
the cleaning button
Lo, it is the cleaning button. To clear out the stored items in your body, put in there from the wand.
the C rune
The C rune. Use this to make a regular cave.
the CP rune
The CP rune. Use this to make a cave passage.
the DETAIL rune
The DETAIL rune. Use this to create a detail in the room you are in. Simply PRESS this rune to bring up the popup detail window.
the ED rune
The ED rune. Use this to make a down exit.
the EE rune
The EE rune. Use this to make an east exit.
the EN rune
The EN rune. Use this to make a north exit.
the ENE rune
The ENE rune. Use this to make a northeast exit.
the ENW rune
The ENW rune. Use this to make a northwest exit.
the ES rune
The ES rune. Use this to make a south exit.
the ESE rune
The ESE rune. Use this to make a southeast exit.
the ESW rune
The ESW rune. Use this to make a southwest exit.
the EU rune
The EU rune. Use this to make an up exit.
the EW rune
The EW rune. Use this to make a west exit.
large flashing rune
A large flashing rune. Looking closer you realize there is a name in your mind. This is your "targeted" room used when creating an exit. It reads: $(this.room:saved).
the HC rune
The HC rune. Use this to make a hewn cave.
the HCP rune
The HCP rune. Use this to make a hewn cave passage.
the O rune
The O rune. Use this to make an outside area.
the OR rune
The OR rune. Use this to make an odd shaped room.
the P rune
The P rune. Use this to make a passageway.
large pulsing rune
A large pulsing rune. Looking closer you realize there is a name in your mind. This is the UrRoom stored in your wand when using the STROKE function. It reads: $(this.room:newurroom).
the RR rune
The RR rune. Use this to make a round room.
the SR rune
The SR rune. Use this to make a square room.
glowing runes

There are several glowing runes on this wand. Though they are strange and neat looking, for the sake of simplicity they will be labeled using the letters of the alphabet. The runes correlate to the following things:
SR = Square room
RR = Round room
P = Passageway
OR = Odd shaped room
C = Cave
CP = Cave passage
HC = Hewn cave
HCP = Hewn cave passage
O = Outside area
EE = Exit east
EW = Exit west
ES = Exit south
EN = Exit north
ENE = Exit northeast
ENW = Exit northwest
ESW = Exit southwest
ESE = Exit southeast
EU = Exit up
ED = Exit down

Core:Properties.Core:Property:
X[S] \ \
\Building Wand Instructions\\ \ \ \
\Welcome to \\ \The Incredible Building Wand Instruction Guide!\\ Created by: StoryCoder Brenson, Castle Marrach Building Team\
\WARNING\: Read entire instruction guide carefully before using wand. Wand is NOT a toy. Use wand only after you fully understand how it works. If used improperly, unwanted exits, rooms, and areas may result. Please follow the instructions carefully, and refer back to this instruction guide if you are in doubt. Keep away from small children and open flame. Induce vomiting if swallowed.\
This wand is used for creating new rooms (or areas) and for creating exits. It also can create details. It uses custom reacts written in Merry to activate the functions, i.e. tapping, poking, etc. \
\\Wand Summary\\\
\Woename\: Examples:UrRoom:building-wand\ \Glowing runes\: Preset rooms and exits. look my glowing runes to see a list.\ \Flashing rune\: Shows the woe name of the room that is currently targeted by the wand (stored in property “room:saved”). Use this rune when creating exits.\ \Pulsing rune\: Shows the woe name of the UrRoom currently stored in the wand (under the property: “room:newurroom”). Use this rune if you choose not to use one of the preset UrRooms that comes with the wand.\ \Detail rune\: This is used to create details. Press the rune to activate it. Please note that the popup form this function uses does not work on clients like gmud, zmud, or telnet. You need to use one of the Skotos supported clients.\
\\Command Short List\
\\\TAP\: Used with an evoke (woe:name:of:room) on the runes (preset UrRooms) to create a new room.\ \FLICK\: Used with an evoke (woe:name:of:your:UrRoom) to store your custom made UrRoom in the wand.\ \STROKE\: Same as tap (see above), except it uses your stored UrRoom (as stored via the FLICK command).\ \RUB\: Used to target an existing room for an exit.\ \POKE\: Used to create an exit (poking the runes). It will go to the target room seen by looking at the flashing rune.\ \PRESS\: Used to bring up the Detail Creation Form (popup window).\ \SWISH\: Used to create the detail stored in your character body.\
\\Getting Started\\
\ The wand needs to be used in the actual rooms you are building, so if you are starting an area from scratch, you will need to have at least the initial room made up in order to start. Once you have a room to start from, you are able to build the new areas from there.\
Once in the room you need to decide what will be the new destination of the exit you will create. The wand comes with preset UrRooms that are represented by the runes. Another option is to use an UrRoom you have already created.\
\\Preset UrRooms -- The Tap Function\\\\
\ The preset UrRooms are easy to use. To do so, \TAP\ the rune on the wand that represents the preset room you wish to create, while saying the woename that you want the new area to be saved under or it will just be a spawn. Doing this will create a room using the preset UrRoom and give it the name specified. For example:\
\\tap my sr rune, “Game:rooms:area:roomname”\
The SR rune on the wand glows brightly. Time seems to shift slowly, spinning around you. Things blur before you, and suddenly everything snaps back into place. You feel there is a new room somewhere in the cosmos. \\\
Once created, the wand will automatically target your room. It will be stored in the wand to be used as the destination for exits, so you can make a way to get to the room. See "Creating an Exit: The Poke Command" for full details. \
\\Using Your Own UrRoom -- The Flick and Stroke Functions\ \\
Using your own UrRoom involves two commands: one to store the UrRoom in the wand and one to create the room once set.\
To set your custom UrRoom, \FLICK\ the wand while saying the woename of the desired UrRoom. For example:\
\\ flick my wand, “Game:rooms:UrRoom”\
The wand's runes glow brighter for a moment. You know it has stored an UrRoom of your own choosing in the wand.\\\
Please note that you may only have one of your own UrRooms stored in the wand at a time. Picking a new UrRoom will replace the one currently stored in the wand. \
Now that you have your UrRoom stored, you can spawn rooms from it, using the \STROKE\ action. As before, perform the action while saying the woename you wish your new room to have. For example:\
\\ stroke my wand, “Game:rooms:area:roomname”\
The wand's runes flash and you realize that your chosen UrRoom has been spawned, named and targeted.\\\
As before, the woename of the room spawned is stored in the wand for use when creating exits. \
\\Targeting an Existing Room -- The Rub Function \\\
There is also a function for re-targeting the wand, for times when you are using a room that is already in existence. To do so, \RUB\ the wand while saying the woename of the room you wish the wand to target. An example of this is:\
\\rub my wand, “Game:rooms:area:roomname”\
The wand's runes glow brighter for a moment. You know it has targeted a room somewhere out there in the cosmos.\\\
You may now create an exit to the existing room.\
\\Creating an Exit -- The Poke Function \\\
Before creating an exit, make sure your wand is targeting the room you wish your exit to lead to. Look at the flashing rune to see what is currently targeted by the wand.\
The Wand has 10 Runes that apply to exits, all of the different directions. They all start with E and end with the first letter of the direction. So EE would be exit east and ED would be exit down. All you need to do at this point is \POKE\ the rune corresponding to the direction you wish the exit to go. For example:\
\poke my eu rune\
You gesture with your wand and a beam of pure light blasts downwardly. Lo and behold an exit leading up has appeared. \\
An exit then appears in the room you are in leading to the targeted room.\
\\Creating a Detail – The Press and Swish Functions \\\
\NOTE\: this function will not work with clients that do not support popup windows.\
\PRESS\ the detail rune on the wand to bring up the popup window. (\press my detail rune\) This window will contain a form that has all of the properties one needs to create a proper detail. Fill out the form and submit the information. Currently the window will be redirected to \www.skotos.net\ . This means the information has been stored. Go ahead and close the window.\
The information is stored in your character body under property names. To create the stored detail, merely \SWISH\ the wand (\swish my wand\) and the detail will appear in the room you are in. Because the information is stored in your body, you can swish the wand in any number of rooms to create the detail. To work on a new detail, press the detail rune and fill out the information with the new detail you wand. Submitting this will overwrite the properties in your body with the new ones.\
\\Final Note \\\
The important thing to remember when using this wand is to do things in the proper order. Always make sure you are in the room you wish for the exit to appear in and that your wand is targeting the room you wish that exit to lead to before actually creating an exit. This will avoid confusion as well as unnecessary trips to the Tree of Woe to repair the damage.\
\ \ \ \

X[S] \ \
\Success!\ \ \ \
\ \You have successfully committed your form!\ \\\ \ \
\\
